Key Match Events: Mahmoud Al Aswad scored the opening goal for Syria in the 7th minute
Daleho Irandust doubled Syria's lead in the 76th minute
Sabbag scored the third goal for Syria in stoppage time
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian defence had a rough day in the office
India produced a better performance in the second half
Others: Manolo Marquez' first assignment as coach ended on a sour note
Syria fielded a much-changed team as they just needed a draw to secure the trophy
